title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for dx/dt

1 point is earned for dy/dt

1 point is earned for dy/dx

1 point is earned for evaluates students dy/dx at t = π/2

dx dt = e t sint+ e t cost dy dt = e t cost− e t sint dy dx = dy/ dt dx/ dt = e t (cost−sint) e t (sint+cost) at t =  π 2 , dy dx = e π 2 (0−1) e π 2 (1+0) =−1

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for equation of speed

1 point is earned for evaluating expression

Speed= ( e t sint+ e t cost ) 2 + ( e t cost− e t sint ) 2

When t = 1 speed is
( esin1+ecos1 ) 2 + ( ecos1−esin1 ) 2 =e 2

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for equation with correct integrand and limits

1 points is earned for simplifying equation for speed

1 point is earned for solution

distance is

∫ 0 1 ( e t sint+ e t cost ) 2 + ( e t cost− e t sint ) 2  dt  = ∫ 0 1 2 e 2t ( sin 2 t+ cos 2 t )  dt= ∫ 0 1 2   e t dt =  2 e t | 0 1 = 2  (e−1)
